items.sentence: I know that Tom is accustomed to doing that.
I know that Tom has done that at least once.
I know that Tom had a lot of fun doing that.
I know that Tom does that from time to time.
I know that Tom didn't know that I did that.
I know that Tom likes doing that by himself.
I know that Tom knows you shouldn't do that.
I know that Tom knows why he should do that.
I know that Tom knows why I want to do that.
I know that Tom knows why I need to do that.
I know that Tom knows why I have to do that.
I know that Tom knows when I should do that.
I know that Tom knows that I had to do that.
I know that Tom knows Mary wants to do that.
I know that Tom knows Mary ought to do that.
I know that Tom knows Mary needs to do that.
I know that Tom knows I know how to do that.
I know that Tom knows I hardly ever do that.
I know that Tom knows I don't often do that.
I know that Tom knew why you didn't do that.
